content:
StartFromZero Enum

Definition

Indicates whether an axis segment should start from zero when a scale break is used.

In this Article

public enum StartFromZero
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
StartFromZero

Remarks

The StartFromZero enumeration is used to set the value of the StartFromZero property and indicates whether an axis segment should start from zero.

Fields

Auto

The Chart control calculates whether to start the axis scale at zero or at a more appropriate rounded value.
No

Do not start the axis segment scale from zero.
Yes

Start the axis segment scale from zero.
